metadata.title: COLHYBRI — Financial Inclusion Through Local Commerce
metadata.description: COLHYBRI connects underbanked individuals with local shops through a $3/month subscription, creating a community-powered financial ecosystem. Part of ONLYMORE Group ($12.5M+ ARR, 520,000 clients).

hero.headline: Every dollar you spend locally creates $2.50 in community value
hero.subheadline: COLHYBRI connects underbanked individuals with neighborhood shops through a simple $3/month subscription. Together, we build financial inclusion from the ground up.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.headline: Doing Our Part — Like the Hummingbird
mission.description: In a Native American legend, while the forest burns, the hummingbird carries water drop by drop. When asked why, it replies: "I am doing my part." COLHYBRI embodies this spirit — small actions by many create massive collective impact.

inclusion.title: Financial Inclusion
inclusion.description: 63 million Americans are underbanked or unbanked. COLHYBRI provides affordable access to essential financial services for just $3/month — no credit check, no minimum balance.

commerce.title: Local Commerce
commerce.description: Local shops become community financial hubs. Every transaction through COLHYBRI strengthens the neighborhood economy through the Keynesian multiplier effect.

community.title: Community Power
community.description: When individuals and shops connect through COLHYBRI, money circulates locally. Every $1 spent generates $2.50 in local economic activity.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.headline: Three Simple Steps to Financial Inclusion

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Individuals join for $3/month. No credit check, no bank account needed. Instant access to the COLHYBRI community financial network.

connect.title: Connect Locally
connect.description: Shops join for $10/month and become community financial hubs. They offer COLHYBRI services alongside their existing business.

thrive.title: Thrive Together
thrive.description: Every transaction multiplies. The Keynesian multiplier turns each $3 subscription into $7.50 in local economic value.

impact.title: Impact
impact.headline: The Keynesian Multiplier in Action
impact.description: Every dollar that circulates locally generates 2.5x its value in economic activity. COLHYBRI channels spending into local commerce, creating jobs and strengthening communities.

jobsCreated.label: Per 200 active subscribers in a neighborhood

moneyLocal.label: Of spending stays in the community

miami.title: Miami Launch 2026
miami.headline: COLHYBRI Launches in Miami — America's Gateway to Financial Inclusion
miami.description: Miami-Dade County has one of the highest rates of underbanked residents in the United States. With its vibrant Latino community and thriving local commerce, Miami is the perfect launchpad for COLHYBRI's mission.

whyMiami.title: Why Miami?
reasons: 30%+ of Miami-Dade residents are underbanked or unbanked
70% Hispanic/Latino population — the community COLHYBRI was built for
Thriving small business ecosystem with 300,000+ local shops
America's gateway to Latin America — natural expansion path

forIndividuals.title: For Individuals
forIndividuals.headline: Financial Freedom Starts at $3/Month
forIndividuals.description: No bank account? No problem. COLHYBRI gives you access to essential financial services through your neighborhood shops. Save, spend, and build your financial future — all for $3/month.

forShops.title: For Local Shops
forShops.headline: Your Shop, Your Community's Financial Hub
forShops.description: Join COLHYBRI for $10/month and transform your business into a community financial center. Increase foot traffic, build customer loyalty, and make a real difference in your neighborhood.

forCities.title: For Cities
forCities.headline: Revitalize Main Street with COLHYBRI
forCities.description: Cities partnering with COLHYBRI see measurable increases in local economic activity. Our platform strengthens the commercial fabric of neighborhoods while advancing financial inclusion goals.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.headline: The COLHYBRI Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: COLHYBRI is part of the ONLYMORE Group, a proven technology company with $12.5M+ in annual recurring revenue and 520,000 active clients. Our ecosystem connects individuals, local shops, and city governments.

investors.title: Investors
investors.headline: Invest in Financial Inclusion
investors.description: COLHYBRI combines proven unit economics ($12.5M+ ARR across ONLYMORE Group) with massive social impact. We're seeking partners who share our vision of financial inclusion through local commerce.

questions.a: COLHYBRI is a financial inclusion platform that connects underbanked individuals with local shops through a $3/month subscription. It creates a community-powered financial ecosystem where money circulates locally, generating 2.5x economic value through the Keynesian multiplier effect.
COLHYBRI costs $3/month for individuals and $10/month for local shops. There are no hidden fees, no credit checks, and no minimum balance requirements.

questions.q: Do I need a bank account to use COLHYBRI?
questions.a: No. COLHYBRI is specifically designed for people who are underbanked or unbanked. You can access financial services through participating local shops in your neighborhood.
COLHYBRI is launching in Miami, Florida in H1 2026. Miami-Dade County was chosen because of its large underbanked population and vibrant local commerce ecosystem.
COLHYBRI is created by ONLYMORE Group, led by founder and CEO Florent Gibert. ONLYMORE Group has $12.5M+ in annual recurring revenue and serves 520,000 active clients.

questions.q: What is the Keynesian multiplier effect?
questions.a: The Keynesian multiplier describes how money spent locally generates additional economic activity. With COLHYBRI, every $3 subscription creates approximately $7.50 in local economic value as money circulates through the community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.headline: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in COLHYBRI? Whether you're an individual, a local shop owner, a city official, or an investor, we'd love to hear from you.

footer.quote: "I am doing my part." — Native American Legend (The Hummingbird)

localStats.title: Local Impact in Your Country
localStats.subtitle: Real economic data showing how COLHYBRI can transform your community.
